title: In N.H.L. Finals, Avalanche Go From Chaser to Front-Runner
description: In taking a 2-0 series lead against the two-time defending champion Tampa Bay Lightning in the Stanley Cup finals, Colorado’s complete ascension to the top of the league is within reach.
dc:creator: David Waldstein
media:description: Colorado’s Valeri Nichushkin, right, scored twice in his team's 7-0 rout of Tampa Bay in Game 2.
